alert.note: Alert for Lake; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 23 at 5:56PM MDT until October 23 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MOODY...EASTERN KINGSBURY...NORTHEASTERN LAKE AND BROOKINGS COUNTIES... At 655 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nunda, or 13 miles northeast of Madison, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public report of 1.5 inch hail reported in Madison SD at approximately 6:39 CDT. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Brookings, Volga, Arlington, Bruce, Oakwood State Park and White. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
